toc_entry.title: Howdy, Son. I’m The Law In This County
toc_entry.description: These fourteen Texas sheriffs are everything you thought a sheriff ought to be. But look quick; the old-time county lawman is riding off into the sunset.

toc_entry.title: How To Buy A Dress Without Going To The Store
toc_entry.description: Shopping from catalogs can keep you in fashion and out of the malls.

toc_entry.title: Tiptoeing On The Ocean Of Storms
toc_entry.description: What astronaut Alan Bean saw on the moon changed his life. Now, with paint and canvas, he’s trying to let the rest of us see it too.

toc_entry.title: Little Baby Blue
toc_entry.description: For the first few hours of her life, our baby seemed fine. Then she started turning blue, and her two-year struggle to survive began.

toc_entry.title: Trashy Business
toc_entry.description: When Houston’s rich and powerful join forces with environmentalists to battle big corporations, they can be fighting over only one thing. Garbage.

toc_entry.title: The Marfa Lights
toc_entry.subtitle: Texas Primer
toc_entry.description: What is it that makes them dance across the desert night? A trick of physicsor something stranger?

toc_entry.title: The Adventures Of The Red Couch In Texas
toc_entry.description: Once upon a time a velveteen couch traveled the land in search of heroes and myths. It found them from the Panhandle to the Gulf.

toc_entry.title: Jambalaya, Crawfish Pie, File Gumbo
toc_entry.description: Son of a gun, they've got great food on the bayou.

toc_entry.title: Bluebonnet Picture
toc_entry.subtitle: Western Art
toc_entry.description: An interpretation of a classic genre.

toc_entry.title: Downer On The Farm
toc_entry.subtitle: Movies
toc_entry.description: Country and Places in the Heart both heap on down-home moral uplift; Stop Making Sense is a joyous rockumentary; Amadeus spouts dingdong conceits.

toc_entry.title: Trevino’s Mother
toc_entry.subtitle: Art
toc_entry.description: Whistler had nothing on the 22 artists represented in a survey of Hispanic art.

toc_entry.title: 4 Br, 2 Ba, Needs Work
toc_entry.subtitle: Lifestyles
toc_entry.description: Why did I trade in my trouble-free condo for an aging country home with decrepit plumbing? I’m trying to figure that out myself.

toc_entry.title: Lawrence Welk Meets The Doors
toc_entry.subtitle: Popular Music
toc_entry.description: Brave Combo’s World Dance Music brings wit and verve to an unlikely mix of sounds; the Sir Douglas Quintet is still recording after all these years.

toc_entry.title: Back In The Huddle Again
toc_entry.subtitle: Books
toc_entry.description: Dan Jenkins’ new football novel, Life Its Ownself, picks up where Semi-Tough left off; Heat From Another Sun, a dark detective novel, turns on the gore.

toc_entry.title: Teagarden Of Delights
toc_entry.subtitle: Jazz
toc_entry.description: Tribute to Teagarden captures the fullness and humanity of the late Texas trombonist’s art; plus a roundup of recent jazz releases.

toc_entry.title: ’Twas The Night After Christmas
toc_entry.subtitle: Software
toc_entry.description: And all through the house, every modem was stirring, and so was the mouse.

toc_entry.title: Reporter
toc_entry.description: Life after the oil bust is fair-to-Midland; bad News, hard Times in Laredo; I hear a timpani; a coach who believes winning is everything

toc_entry.title: State Secrets
toc_entry.description: No joy in Cubville; deregulation is a gas; two airline wars-one cold, one hot; are the politicians back in control at UT?
